Posts.EditableText: So, I've made verbs in a character/object under their verb tab. But this means that they won't appear in the displayverbs or verbinventory list. (Instead, when I add the custom verbs to the displayverbs list they are shown twice in the interaction menu when clicking the character/object.) Please tell me how I can hide verbs/interactions that simply Do not exist in the first place? But are still located on the character's or object's interaction menu?
Posts.HTML: So, I've made verbs in a character/object under their verb tab. But this means that they won't appear in the displayverbs or verbinventory list. (Instead, when I add the custom verbs to the displayverbs list they are shown twice in the interaction menu when clicking the character/object.) Please tell me how I can hide verbs/interactions that simply Do not exist in the first place? But are still located on the character's or object's interaction menu?
